text: This is next level! Finally, love and relationships can be as secure as my crypto wallet! 💖🔐
I can't wait to see how this plays out in real life. Will we see a surge of crypto power couples? 💑🚀
I'm just waiting for the inevitable breakup tokens and broken heart NFTs. 💔🎨
Don't give them any ideas! We'll end up with a whole new market for romantic assets. 😂
I wonder if this app requires a prenup smart contract for every relationship? 🤔
That would be hilarious! Imagine if every argument had to be resolved by the blockchain. 😂
I'm pretty sure I'd get stuck in an infinite loop of disagreements. 🔄
You'd need a strong consensus mechanism to resolve that! 😅
But what if one of the parties involved in the relationship is not into crypto? Would that be a dealbreaker? 🤷‍♂️
Maybe they can tokenize their love and exchange it on the open market? 💱💕
If love is an ERC20 token, I'll start a love ICO and make a fortune! 😂💸
I'd invest in that! Let's get this love train going 🚂💨
The real question is, will this make catfishing a thing of the past? 🐱🎣
The blockchain never lies, so we might finally have a way to verify our love interests' identities! 🙌
But will it protect us from the dreaded "Ex" smart contract that automatically sends half of our assets away? 😳
If it does, sign me up! I've had enough of that in real life. 😅
